Class TopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener<T extends TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.plugins.activity.core.TopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Concrete to of TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllUsersTopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener, EntityTopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener, ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener

    public abstract class TopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener<T extends TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent>
extends Object
implements EventListener<T>
    Abstract event listener for TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent to ease implementing concrete listeners.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
